definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Yochanan ben Zakkai was the youngest and most distinguished disciple of Rabbi Hillel.
sentences.chinese: 约翰南是希列尔拉比最年轻最杰出的学生。

sentences.english: Remember that Paul's background is that of a first century Rabbinical Jew.
sentences.chinese: 保罗的身世背景是第一世纪的拉比犹太教徒。

sentences.english: In the mean while his disciples prayed him, saying, Master, eat.
sentences.chinese: 这其间，门徒对耶稣说，拉比请吃。

sentences.english: Rabby sat frowning at the intimidating pile of dirty dishes.
sentences.chinese: 拉比坐在那儿，愁眉苦脸地看着那吓人的一堆脏碗碟。

sentences.english: This is likely to lower production incentives for Arabica producers.
sentences.chinese: 这很有可能减少阿拉比卡咖啡种植农的生产热情。

sentences.english: The idea, then as now, in the rabbinic tradition, was that a man obtained righteousness through good works.
sentences.chinese: 犹太拉比的传统认为一个人要藉著行善才能得义。

sentences.english: 7 they love to be greeted in the marketplaces and to have men call them `Rabbi.
sentences.chinese: 又喜爱人在街市上问他安，称呼他拉比。

sentences.english: Nathanael answered and saith unto him, Rabbi , thou art the Son of God.
sentences.chinese: 纳撒尼尔回答他说，拉比，你是神的儿子。

sentences.english: Reema Sisodia was a friend of Rivkah, the rabbi's wife.
sentences.chinese: 西索迪亚是拉比妻子瑞夫卡的朋友。

sentences.english: Matured on the high plateaus of Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 采用源自巴西高原的阿拉比卡咖啡豆。

sentences.english: By the time her rabbi came to visit her, she was emaciated.
sentences.chinese: 当她的拉比来看她时，她已经消瘦下去了。

sentences.english: Rabie agrees, however, that negotiations are a promising step.
sentences.chinese: 拉比耶同意，但是，谈判是有希望的一步。

sentences.english: Fifth, this finger stands for Rabia.
sentences.chinese: 第五件，这根手指代表拉比雅。

sentences.english: In particular, the case in which frequency Rabi oscillations is a linear function of the photon number is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 特别讨论了拉比振荡频率与光子数成线性关系的情况。

sentences.english: They said unto him, Rabbi, (which is to say, being interpreted, Master, ) where dwellest thou?
This species of coffee plant known as arabica coffee is the most commonly grown species of coffee grown throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉比卡咖啡树是全世界种植最普遍的一种咖啡树。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God/also written 穆罕默德
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Wylie (name)/Turrell Wylie, originator of the Wylie transcription of Tibetan script
